narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license at site 002. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted 
with the applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
